name: Isohunt / Marble
description: Still a work in progress: expect updates
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("isohunt.com") {

HTML
{background: transparent url("data:image/jpeg;base64,") top left repeat !important}

body
{background-color: transparent !important;
color: #ababab !important}

INPUT
,TEXTAREA
,SELECT
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
background-color: transparent !important;
border-color: #ababab !important;
color: #edcca8 !important}

td,
tr,
table,
div,
tbody
{background: transparent !important;
border: none !important}

A
,.ihHead
{color: #edcca8 !important}

FONT[color="#cc0000"]
,P[style="margin: 0.5em 0.5em 1.5em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold;"]
{color: #ababab !important}

.hlRow
{border-bottom: 1px #ababab !important}

HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:first-child > TBODY > TR > TD:first-child
{background: transparent url("data:image/jpeg;base64,") top left repeat-x !important}

#nav LI
HTML,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:first-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > TABLE > TBODY > TR:first-child > TD,
.ihLogo,
.ihHead
{background: transparent url("data:image/jpeg;base64,") top left repeat-x !important}

.hlRow
{background: transparent url("data:image/png;base64,") top left repeat-x !important}

.pager a, .pager a:visited, #nav li li a, .topBar #login a:hover, .errorline, .forumline, a.postreply:hover, span.postreply a:hover, #more, #torrent_details, #cached_torrents li li a
{border-color: #edcca8 !important}

.pager,
#login,
#login > A:first-child,
#login > A:last-child,
.topBar,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > DIV:first-child + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:last-child > TD,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > DIV:first-child + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:first-child + TR > TD,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:first-child > BR:first-child + TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > P:last-child,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:first-child > BR:first-child + TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > A:first-child + A + A + P,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > SCRIPT:first-child + A + BR + BR + DIV + A + BR + BR + DIV + IFRAME + BR + BR + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:last-child > TD,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > SCRIPT:first-child + A + BR + BR + DIV + A + BR + BR + DIV + IFRAME + BR + BR + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:first-child + TR > TD,
TD[width="84%"],
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:first-child > BR:first-child + TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD,
.navbkg,
.row1,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > SCRIPT:first-child + BR + BR + DIV + A + BR + BR + DIV + IFRAME + BR + BR + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:first-child + TR,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > SCRIPT:first-child + BR + BR + DIV + A + BR + BR + DIV + IFRAME + BR + BR + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:last-child > TD,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > DIV:first-child + BR + BR + DIV + A + BR + BR + DIV + IFRAME + BR + BR + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:first-child + TR,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > DIV:first-child + BR + BR + DIV + A + BR + BR + DIV + IFRAME + BR + BR + TABLE + BR + TABLE > TBODY > TR:last-child > TD,
.row4,
.gensmall,
#text
{background-color: transparent !important;
color: #ababab !important}

HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > FORM:first-child + P + DIV + A + BR + BR + DIV + IFRAME + BR + BR + TABLE + BR + TABLE td,
HTML > BODY > TABLE > TBODY > TR > TD > TABLE:last-child > TBODY > TR > TD:last-child > P
{background-color: transparent !important;
color: #ababab !important}

U, B, SPAN
{background-color: transparent !important;
color: #ababab !important}

.row4
{border-left: 1px solid #666 !important}

.quote,
.row3
{background-color: transparent !important;
color: #d2d2d2 !important}

#torrent_details > DIV
,#torrent_details P
,.fileRows
,.fileRowsRight
,.pager td
{color: #edcca8 !important}

.ihLogo,
#ad,
.SL_zone,                            /*sponsors1*/
.SERP_zone,                          /*sponsors2*/
.Listing,                            /*sponsors3*/
div#ad,                              /*ads tex*/
a[href*="banner"],                   /*banners text*/
img[src*="logo"],                    /*logo*/
img[src*="banner"],                  /*banners ads*/
img[src*="cpxinteractive"],          /*front page ads*/
script[src*="ad"],                   /*ads script*/
iframe[src*="iframead"],             /*iframes ads*/
div[style="border: 1px solid orange; padding: 5px;"],   /*ads*/
*[width="120"][height="600"],
*[width="160"][height="600"],
*[width="468"][height="60"],
*[width="728"][height="90"],
[href*="anrdoezrs.net"],[src*="anrdoezrs.net"]
{display:none!important}

#detailsTabs a
,#detailsTabs span
{background-image:none !important;
background: #2b222d url("data:image/jpeg;base64,") top left repeat-x !important}

#detailsTabs a
{border: 1px solid #666 !important}

}
